translation.title: Hi, I'm
translation.subtitle: Currently working as a freelancer. I develop User Interfaces, web and mobile applications
translation.introductionText: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Three.js, i18N, etc... I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!
translation.jobs: WHAT I HAVE DONE SO FAR
translation.points1: Developing web and mobile applications using ReactJS and React Native and other related technologies.
translation.points11: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, and other developers to create high-quality product.
translation.points111: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
translation.points2: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
translation.points22: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality product.
translation.points222: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
translation.points2222: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.
translation.points3: I developed a custom website for an exceptional accounting firm, Pinheiro Contabilidade
translation.points33: Using modern technologies such as ReactJS and Styled-Components, integrated with an API specialized in providing updated monthly newsletters about the world of accounting.
translation.projectsDescription: The following projects showcase my skills and experience through examples of my work on real projects. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and/or live demos. This reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies and manage projects effectively.
translation.projectDescription1: Corporate benefit focused on beauty. A platform where registered customers can make appointments and discover the location of partner establishments.
translation.projectDescription2: A platform for registration of offices so that they can register their customers and their respective audiences, in addition to digital signature, generate PDF among other features.
translation.projectDescription3: Custom website for an accounting firm. integrated with an API that specializes in providing updated monthly newsletters about the world of accounting.
translation.projectDescription4: Landing page for professional promotion of a Nutrition office. With various information and interactions with the user.
translation.contactDescription: I would love to hear about your current job and how I could help. I am currently looking for a position and open to multiple opportunities. I'm a hardworking and positive person who will always do things with a sense of purpose and attention to detail. Feel free to check out my profiles below and get in touch using the form.
translation.placeholderMessage: Waht do you want to say?
translation.feedback: Thank you. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.alert: Ahh, something went wrong. Make sure you fill in all the fields and try again, please.
